resources.string: Here you can set the email account to be used for sending SMS contents.\nThe button starts the receiver that catches SMS and forwards them via the specified email account.\nIf you\'ve changed settings along the way, a test mail will be sent and you\'ll be asked to confirm its receipt to really start the receiver.
Confirm that you\'ve received the test mail
If you see this mail, your settings are set correctly and your SMS should be forwarded properly to this mail address.
